commit message: Update Octicons to v3.2.0
Fix wrong placement of some files
Don't show references to nonexistent commits in issues

If an issue is closed from a commit, show the commit in the event.

Fixes #95
Update Play Store icon
Update OkHttp to v2.6.0
Fix rendering of some markdown files

Fix bug when a repository has two files with same name but different case.

Fixes #40
Fix crash when the actor is null
'logos' is not a valid username
Fix bug when objects have same name but different case
Use TextInputLayout for login screen
Minor improvement to the style of the new TextInputLayout
New Material Design inputs in the login screen.

Change the color of the autocomplete popup so the text is readable.

Fixes #120
Fix invalid padding value

Change the background of the menu panel so the text is readable.

Fixes #109
Add F-Droid link to the README

Fix autocomplete popup shadow in some devices

This is the proper fix for #120

Don't load issue images in Froyo as it crashes the app.

OkHttp doesn't support Froyo, so we can't use it for loading images.

Fixes #116
Removed unused & depreciated constructor of WebView
'showcases' and 'trending' are not valid usernames
Use the 'switch' statement to make the code more readable

Update the gist menu when changing gists.

In modern versions of the Android SDK onPrepareOptionsMenu is
not being called for fragments, so the menu wasn't being updated.

Use hardware acceleration everywhere.
